snippet: The Rev. Louie Giglio, selected by President Obama to deliver the benediction, withdrew amid controversy over remarks he made in the 1990s about homosexuality.
abstract: Rev Louie Giglio, selected by Pres Obama to deliver the benediction at his second-term inaugural, withdraws amid controversy over remarks he made in the 1990s about homosexuality.
lead_paragraph: The Rev. Louie Giglio, selected by President Obama to deliver the benediction, withdrew amid controversy over remarks he made in the 1990s about homosexuality.

headline.seo: Minister Pulls Out of Inauguration After Outcry
headline.main: Minister Backs Out of Speech at Inaugural
headline.print_headline: Minister Backs Out Of Speech At Inaugural
